By kernel_test do you mean this? And do you have any specific guidelines or standards that I should follow, or should I just try and make something similar to what is already in the seq2seq_test.py file?

body:
@lukaszkaiser Thanks for your fast response, I can look into the testing part, sure.

By `kernel_test` do you mean [this](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/kernel_tests/seq2seq_test.py)? And do you have any specific guidelines or standards that I should follow, or should I just try and make something similar to what is already in the `seq2seq_test.py` file?
